text: Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (born 12 February 1982), known by his stage name Bobi Wine, is a Ugandan politician, singer, actor and businessman. He has been a member of the Parliament of Uganda since 2017. He is the leader of the People Power, Our Power movement. He is a known critic of President Yoweri Museveni. In June 2019, he announced his candidacy for the 2021 Ugandan presidential election. He lost the election on January 14, 2021 to President Museveni. On 3rd of September 2024, Bobiwine, was shot in the leg by a police officer in Bulindo, kira in wakiso District. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Ugandan politicians Category:African entertainers Category:African businesspeople Category:Singers Category:Movie actors Category:Makerere University alumni
title: Bobi Wine
